Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 9 Dassanenapahātabbattika » 9.1 Paṭiccavāra » 9.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 9.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Najhāna
Dassanenapahātabbattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Najhāna
27.
844Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ…pe…  najhānapaccayā—  pañcaviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe… .
<< Naindriyaup Namagga >>
